alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 29 at 10:47AM PDT until May 29 at 11:15AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM PDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 1044 AM PDT, a dust channel was still seen on satellite from Amboy to near Parker Arizona HAZARD...1 to 3 mile visibility with strong winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Hazardous travel for commuters along State Route 62 from Twentynine Palms to Vidal Junction. Locations impacted include... Twentynine Palms, Twentynine Palms Base, Twentynine Palms Airport, Amboy, Ludlow, Joshua Tree Lake Campground, Earp, Vidal Junction, Big River and Johnson Valley. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE! To report severe weather, contact the National Weather Service, or your nearest law enforcement agency, who will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Las Vegas.
